translation.en: -Have a good night. -Thanks.
[woman] Oh, come in.
Thank you so much for squeezing me in.
Oh, sure.
I'm so happy I found this spot.
-I just moved here. -To New York?
No, to the Bronx. I got priced out of my old neighborhood.
translation.zh: ‎不 布朗克斯 ‎我在老街区那里租不起房了

translation.en: Oh, I hear you. Same thing's been happening here.
translation.zh: ‎我了解 这里的情况也一样

translation.en: You know, they offered me a stupid amount of money for my salon.
translation.zh:
‎你知道不
‎他们愿意出天价买下我的美容院

translation.en: - Agh. -Yeah, so I took it.
Hey! Wow, that's great.
In fact, this is Becky's last mani ever.
translation.zh:
‎事实上 这是贝基美容院
‎最后一单美甲生意了

translation.en: This cuticle pusher's about to go out of business… now.
translation.zh: ‎这个死皮推马上就要退休了

translation.en: This is the best manicure I've ever had. Don't sell.
translation.zh:
‎这是我做过最棒的美甲
‎别把美容院卖了

translation.en: Good evening. Frank Polidori.
translation.zh: ‎晚上好 我是弗兰克波利多里

translation.en: It's too late now.
We're finishing up all the paperwork tonight.
translation.zh: ‎我们今晚就要把合约给签了

translation.en: Come on, Frank. Let's go. [speaking Spanish] Come on.
Now, right there.
Okay. And… great.
Now you got the money for you and your husband, -if you wanna-- -Aagh.
translation.zh:
‎现在你和你老公有了这笔钱
‎如果你想…

translation.en: I'm not married, Frank. I don't have a boyfriend either.
translation.zh: ‎我未婚 弗兰克 也没有男友

translation.en: -I don't need no man to know my worth. -Course not.
translation.zh:
‎-我不用男人来肯定我的价值
‎-当然

translation.en: [smacks lips] So, it's just you, then.
Yeah, it's just me.
Well, Becky, let's get you on your way to the suburbs.
translation.zh: ‎贝基 咱们来帮你搬到郊区去

translation.en: Yes! [speaking Spanish]
You can come too if you want sometimes. You can come visit.
translation.zh: ‎你想要的话 偶尔可以来看我的

translation.en: [Frank] Course I will.
-[laughs] That's it? -[Frank] Mm-hm.
[in Spanish] Yeah, I'm leaving for the suburbs!
Shoot it! Shoot it!
[boy] Hey, Lil Mayor!
[man] Yo, Lil Mayor, what's up?
-Yo, what's up Carl? Nice to see you. -What's poppin', kid?
translation.zh:
‎-哟 卡尔 很高兴见到你
‎-忙啥呢 小子？

translation.en: -[Miguel] Coming to the block party? -You know it!
translation.zh:
‎-你会来街区派对吧？
‎-那还用说！

translation.en: -What's up, Perez? -[speaking Spanish]
-What's up, papi? -[speaking Spanish]
You know what's up!
What's poppin', y'all? It's your girl Gloria, live, on this beautiful 95-degree day,
translation.zh:
‎哟 我是葛洛丽亚
‎在此美丽的35度烈日下为你现场直播

translation.en: but trust me, this ain't sweat. This is glow. Get it.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 这可不是汗 而是光芒

translation.en: -Miguel! -[speaks Spanish]
[Gloria] Summer's almost done, so make sure to step outside and catch that tan while you can, you heard?
translation.zh:
‎听着 夏天快接近尾声了
‎所以赶紧抓紧机会美个黑吧

translation.en: Oh, and if you see a kid that's riding a bike two sizes too big for him,
translation.zh:
‎还有 如果你看到个小子
‎骑着尺寸不合身高的自行车

translation.en: that's just Lil Mayor trying to save the neighborhood all by himself.
translation.zh:
‎那只是小市长
‎在试图独自一人拯救这个街区

translation.en: Oh, and speaking of saving the neighborhood,
what's up with all these missing person flyers?
translation.zh: ‎怎么突然那么多寻人启事啊？

translation.en: I thought this new construction was supposed to make it safer.
translation.zh: ‎新施工不是该让这地方更安全吗？

translation.en: Something to think about, y'all.
Bobby!
Lil Cool, where you been, man?
Hanging posters. I'll be right out.
What do you think, Tony?
-Looks good, bro. You a good artist. -Thanks.
translation.zh:
‎-很不错 你的画技很棒
‎-谢谢

translation.en: Listen, I appreciate what you're trying to do,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我很感激你的用心

translation.en: -but to be real… [speaking Spanish] -No, don't say that. This is gonna work.
translation.zh: ‎但说实话… ‎不 别这么说 这能行的

translation.en: -All right, Lil Mayor. Mm-hm. -You'll see.
Man…
you ever wanna get rid of that Sammy Sosa bat,
translation.zh:
‎哪天你不想要
‎那根萨米索萨的棒球棍了

translation.en: you let me know.
Bro, would you ask King Arthur for his sword?
translation.zh: ‎老弟 你会向亚瑟王要他的剑吗？

translation.en: Let it go? That junk's going on eBay after they shut me down.
translation.zh:
‎我关门大吉后
‎那破玩意儿就放到网上拍卖

translation.en: Can you put this on my tab?
And this on your tab.
-[chuckles] -Yeah, I already know.
-Don't worry. I'll pay you back. -Course. Go ahead.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 我会还你的 ‎才怪 拿去吧

translation.en: -What you doing, Miguel? Come outside. -[Tony] Bobby, what's good, bro?
translation.zh: ‎在干嘛呢 米格尔？快出来 ‎你好啊 鲍比

translation.en: -Tony. What's up? -Getting into trouble?
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 托尼 你好
‎-惹麻烦了吗？

translation.en: -Nah. -[Tony chuckles]
-Outta here. -Bye.
-Later, bro. -[speaking Spanish]
-[door chimes] -We gotta go, Bobby.
Luis is waiting, and I got a bunch more posters to put up.
translation.zh:
‎路易斯在等着呢
‎我还有一堆海报要贴

translation.en: -Hi, Rita. -What's up, Lil Mayor?
-Oh, yeah. -[girls laughing]
Kid trying to get his play on. I bet you a beer he strike out. Watch this.
translation.zh: ‎那小子在泡妞呢 ‎跟你赌一瓶啤酒 他肯定没戏

translation.en: Miguel, I was telling these ladies about that block party we putting together Friday night.
translation.zh:
‎米格尔 我正好和这些女士们说起了
‎我俩周五晚上要办的派对

translation.en: We?
Yeah, your boy said he was gonna hook us up with some VIP passes.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 你伙计说
‎能给我们弄几张贵宾通行证

translation.en: VIP? What VIP?
Rita, let's go. I'm done with these kids.
translation.zh: ‎丽塔 我们走吧 ‎我受够这些小屁孩了

translation.en: Yo, Lil Mayor, I wanna keep my beers!
translation.zh: ‎小市长 别害我输掉啤酒啊！

translation.en: Hey, hold up!
Um, I'll see about the VIP. Just…
translation.zh: ‎要贵宾通行证没问题 不过…

translation.en: contribute something to the bodega fund. it's important for the community.
translation.zh: ‎你们得给杂货店基金捐点钱 ‎这对我们社区很重要

translation.en: Y'all love that place.
Yeah, we basically grew up there.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我们在那里长大的

translation.en: So, um…
see you there?
Miguel!
Don't get home late.
Is that your mom?
Nah.
Why are you ignoring me?
It seems like she knows you.
No, that's just some random lady.
translation.zh: ‎哪有 她不过是某位阿姨

translation.en: I'm working late tonight. Are you sure you don't want me to call a babysitter?
translation.zh: ‎我今晚要加班 ‎你确定不要我打电话叫保姆过来吗？

translation.en: -[all laugh] -Yo.
And strike three!
[man] Kid, you're out.
[chuckles] Run that beer, baby. Run that beer.
Yo, we gotta get those girls to show up to the party.
translation.zh:
‎老兄 我们得想办法
‎让那些女孩出席派对

translation.en: Bruh, they, like, 16. They were not feeling us.
translation.zh: ‎老兄 她们十六岁了 对我们不感兴趣

translation.en: They'd be feelin' us if we had some cash, man.
translation.zh: ‎感兴趣的 我们拿出点钱就行

translation.en: -We wouldn't look so broke. -Yo, what the hell is this?
translation.zh: ‎看起来不会那么穷 ‎喂 搞什么啊？

translation.en: -[Bobby] Another one. -They got Becky's too.
Yo, I bet she got hella paid, man.
Everybody's cashing out.
It's all about getting that macchiato and gelato money.
translation.zh:
‎地产公司就是看中了
‎玛奇朵和冰淇淋的利润

translation.en: These Murnau guys are chewing up our neighborhood.
translation.zh:
‎这些穆尔瑙地产的家伙
‎在拆散咱们的社区

translation.en: What was that?
-You see anything? -Nothing.
-[Bobby] Yo, move over, man. -Chill.
[Bobby] Are you for real right now?
-It's just dark. -[Bobby] Can you let me see?
translation.zh:
‎-就黑漆漆一片
‎-让我看看行不？

translation.en: -[Gloria] Yeah! -Damn, girl. What the hell?
What's wrong with you? You almost gave us a heart attack.
translation.zh:
‎你个变态 差点被你吓死
‎在贫民窟的话你早挨枪子了

translation.en: -That's how people get shot in the hood. -You ain't shooting nobody, Lil Mayor.
translation.zh:
‎你个变态 差点被你吓死
‎在贫民窟的话你早挨枪子了 ‎开枪还轮不到你 小市长

translation.en: -Bobby, on the other hand… -Shut up, Gloria.
translation.zh:
‎-鲍比就不一样了…
‎-闭嘴 葛洛丽亚

translation.en: -Know what happened to Becky's? -She dipped. Duh.
translation.zh:
‎-知道贝基美容院的事吗？
‎-废话 她走人了

translation.en: Got that good money and got outta here,
and now we getting yummy nine-dollar cappuccinos.
translation.zh:
‎我们就等着喝
‎每杯要价9美元的卡布奇诺吧

translation.en: -You live now? -Twenty-nine hundred followers,
-what's poppin', GloTV? -Hey! Block party, Friday night.
translation.zh:
‎-哟 葛妹频道
‎-嘿！周五 街区派对

translation.en: -Admission's ten-- -Get outta here, nerd.
translation.zh:
‎-入场费只要十…
‎-滚开啦 怪胎

translation.en: Yo, Drake's gonna be there.
-Know what I'm saying? -Drake?
Yeah. Drake's gonna be there with you Friday night!
translation.zh: ‎没错 德雷克周五和你在派对上见！

translation.en: [Gloria] Don't listen to those fools.
Drake ain't coming nowhere near that block party. Cardi neither.
translation.zh:
‎德雷克才不会出席那个派对
‎卡迪碧也不会

translation.en: It's your girl Gloria signing off. Get it.
translation.zh: ‎葛洛丽亚的直播到此结束咯 懂么？

translation.en: [Bobby] Yo!
[Luis] Finally. I've been waiting an hour.
Relax, Tampa.
No, don't start with that. You know I didn't wanna leave.

translation.en: Don't see the kid six months, that's how he says hi. Bam!
translation.zh: ‎六个月没见 这小子竟然这样打招呼

translation.en: [man] Well, well, well.
Hey, Father Jackson. How you doing?

translation.en: Luis.
Keeping good company, I see.
translation.zh: ‎看来你还是与猪朋狗友为伍呀

translation.en: "Enter not into the path of the wicked, and go not in the way of evil men."
translation.zh: ‎“勿入邪者之途 勿履恶人之路”

translation.en: -So dramatic. -Miguel--
Okay, Bobby got into a minor,
translation.zh: ‎是这样的 鲍比在生物课上

translation.en: minor altercation in biology, and…
translation.zh: ‎和别人起了小小的争执 然后…

translation.en: -Father Jackson kicked him out of school. -You got kicked out?
translation.zh:
‎-被杰克逊神父退学了
‎-你被退学了？

translation.en: -Damon started it. -You're only telling me now?
translation.zh:
‎-是达蒙先挑事的
‎-你现在才告诉我？

translation.en: We didn't want you to worry.
Listen, you worry too much. I mean, look at yourself.
translation.zh: ‎听我说 你操的心太多了 看看你自己

translation.en: You're eating your hand off.
This is it. It's finally happened.
I'm out of the crew.
Everything's different now. Miguel's a politician.
translation.zh:
‎一切都不一样了
‎米格尔成为了政治家

translation.en: Bobby's voice changed all of a sudden.
He sounds like Denzel now.
I bet you even got leg hairs.
translation.zh: ‎我敢打赌你连腿毛也长齐了

translation.en: Yup.
Who is that?
What up, fellas?
Bobby, I ain't heard from you. We doing this, or what?
translation.zh:
‎鲍比 一直没你的消息
‎你到底干不干？

translation.en: Nah. I'm good for now.
All right. You change your mind, you let me know.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 如果改变主意了就告诉我

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, yo.
Those are nice, son. What size are they?
translation.zh: ‎小子 你这双鞋真牛逼 多大号呀？

translation.en: Uh… nine.
That's a little tight, but I think we can make it work.
translation.zh: ‎是有点紧 不过应该能行的

translation.en: -Actually, maybe an eight and a half. -Come on.
translation.zh:
‎-其实好像是八号半而已
‎-拜托

translation.en: -Just leave him alone. -No one's talking to you.
I'm talking to Puerto Rican Harry Potter here.
translation.zh: ‎我跟这位波多黎各版哈利波特说话呢

translation.en: Let him be, Slim. All right, boys. I'll be seeing you.
translation.zh: ‎放过他吧 瘦痞子 ‎好吧 男孩们 后会有期

translation.en: Ah, this kinda stress makes my blood sugar go nuts.
translation.zh: ‎这种压力简直让我的血糖暴跌

translation.en: -What was that all about? -Luis, you really making us look soft.
translation.zh: ‎那是怎么回事？ ‎路易斯 你让咱们看起来像群怂逼

translation.en: Bobby?
Henny asked me to do something. I said no. That's it.
translation.zh: ‎亨尼让我替他做点事 ‎我拒绝了 就这样

translation.en: Let's forget about it.
Luis, I'm sorry I dissed you.
translation.zh: ‎路易斯 很抱歉我吐槽你了

translation.en: Come on.
-Y'all ready? -[Luis] Yeah.
-Listen. I'm gonna spit some. -Okay. -Okay? -All right.
translation.zh:
‎-听着 我要开始饶舌了
‎-好

translation.en: -♪ I got bars like a Kit Kat ♪ -♪ Kit Kat ♪
-♪ Messing with me, you better get back ♪ -♪ Get back ♪
translation.zh:
‎-比手段 你只能靠边站
‎-靠边站

translation.en: -♪ Your breath hot, need a Tic Tac ♪ -♪ Tic Tac ♪
translation.zh:
‎-你口臭 急需个薄荷糖
‎-薄荷糖

translation.en: -♪ Girlfriend make me go skit-skat ♪ -♪ Skit-skat ♪
-♪ And you know, she take a nap, nap ♪ -♪ Nap, nap ♪
♪ And now your hair built like a knapsack ♪
-No. No knap. That's bad. -Oh, my goodness!
I'm so sorry. Pardon me.
You must be lost.
No, I just moved here.
To the Bronx?
Yes. Why does everyone keep saying that?
translation.zh: ‎对 为什么大家都这么问？

translation.en: Oh, I know. You think I'm gonna, like,
translation.zh: ‎我知道了 你一定是认为

translation.en: call the cops and say it's too loud, but that's not me.
translation.zh:
‎我会报警投诉有噪音
‎但我不是那样的人

translation.en: I wanna get to know my neighbors. I'm Vivian.
translation.zh: ‎我想认识我的邻居们 我是薇薇安

translation.en: Miguel Martinez. Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: ‎米格尔马丁内斯 很高兴认识你

translation.en: You should come to our block party Friday night.
translation.zh: ‎这周五晚上来参加我们的街区派对吧

translation.en: We're raising money for Tony's bodega.
translation.zh: ‎我们在为托尼的杂货店筹款

translation.en: Landlord jacked up his rent, so we're trying to help out.
translation.zh: ‎房东涨了他的租金 所以我们想帮忙

translation.en: Here is a flyer.
[Vivian] Oh, my gosh. Wow.
Give me some more flyers,
and I can hand them out to my neighbors, and we can keep this bodega open.
translation.zh:
‎我能发给我的邻居们
‎那杂货店就能继续营业了

translation.en: -Have a bunch. Thanks. It means a lot. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎我有一整叠呢 谢谢
‎这对我们来说很重要

translation.en: Cool. Well, it was nice to meet you.
You, too. Nice meeting you.
You know she's gonna call the cops, right?
translation.zh: ‎你知道她会报警的 对吧？

translation.en: No one says they're not gonna call the cops unless they're gonna call the cops.
translation.zh: ‎就是要报警的人嘴上才会说不报警

translation.en: -[Bobby] You paranoid, man. -[Miguel] Come on.
-Let's go. -That white lady is bad news.
translation.zh:
‎-你还真是疑神疑鬼
‎-走吧 ‎我告诉你 那个白人大姐是个麻烦

translation.en: -[Bobby] Yo. Check out the courthouse. -[Miguel] What's up with that red light?
translation.zh: ‎哟 你们看看法院 ‎那红灯是怎么回事？

translation.en: They're turning it into apartments?
Y'all know how this starts. Them white people with canvas bags?
translation.zh: ‎一切就是这么开始的 ‎那些拿着帆布袋的白人们

translation.en: That's always the first sign.
It was the same dudes who got Becky too.
-You got it out for these guys, huh? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-你还真是看他们不顺眼啊
‎-没错

translation.en: Y'all gonna help me put up these posters, or what?
translation.zh: ‎你们到底帮不帮我贴海报了？

translation.en: Our boy's back in town to get away from the hell that is Tampa,
translation.zh:
‎咱们的兄弟回镇上来
‎是为了逃离坦帕那个鬼地方

translation.en: and we gon' spend the night putting up posters for a lost cause?
translation.zh:
‎我们却要花一整夜
‎为没希望的事贴海报？

translation.en: Lost cause? This is not a lost cause.
Do your thing.
Luis. Xbox at Tony's?
translation.zh: ‎路易斯 去托尼那里打游戏吧？

translation.en: Do whatever you want.
Come on. It'll be good. Let's go.
translation.zh: ‎来嘛 会很好玩的 走吧

translation.en: Sorry!
-What the--? -So sorry!
Lil Mayor messed you up.
Yo, man. It ain't funny! Yo, I'mma kill you!
translation.zh: ‎喂 一点都不好笑！ ‎看我不宰了你！

translation.en: Pedal hard, Lil Mayor. He mad!
translation.zh: ‎使劲踩 小市长 你把他惹火了！

translation.en: I'mma get you later.
You better watch your back.
Hey. What you doing down here, bro?
Yo, Hamilton.
You lost or something?
Just walking.
Yo, what the hell are you wearing?
This?
It's a Belle-Époque hand-embroidered jacket.
translation.zh: ‎是来自美好年代的手工刺绣外套

translation.en: Thank you very much.
Didn't say I liked it.
Hey, stop right there, Mozart.
translation.zh: ‎喂 给我站住 莫扎特

translation.en: [man] It's too late to fight back now.
We are going to wipe you out
like the vermin you are.
-[roars, bites] -Fuck!
-Embarrassing you in your own home. -Bro, this is the wild bootleg controller.
translation.zh: ‎竟然在自己地盘上被打败 ‎喂 这个盗版控制器不好使

translation.en: -Made in Uzbekistan or something. -Whatever.
translation.zh:
‎-好像是乌兹别克斯坦制造的
‎-扯淡

translation.en: Where Miguel at?
Who knows, man? That dude acting crazy.
translation.zh: ‎鬼知道 那家伙疯疯癫癫的

translation.en: He's not crazy. He's just passionate, with big ideas. You know?
translation.zh:
‎他没疯 他只是有远大的理想
‎懂我意思吗？

translation.en: -[door chimes] -He was floating! Oh, my God.
He was floating,
and-- and then he killed Slim!
Yo, you see what I mean?
In the air, like… like… like… and then he bit him with fangs,
translation.zh: ‎他飘在空中 然后用尖牙咬住瘦痞子

translation.en: like he was some kind of a, uh, uh…
-[door chimes] -Go! Get! Get! Get!
[Bobby] Yo, what the hell, man?
Welcome to Primo Bodega.
How can I help you?
Just looking.
What a lovely bodega.
Yeah. You know, I like to keep it clean.
translation.zh: ‎是 我喜欢把店打理得井井有条

translation.en: You from around here?
-New to the neighborhood. -Okay.
What do you, uh, do for work?
Real estate.
[whispers] Murnau Properties.
Wait.
There it is.
Hand sanitizer. Yup.
It's a dirty hood, bro. [chuckles] Four-fifty.
-[clinking] -Keep the change.
Yo.
We got vampires in the Bronx.
There's nothing there, stupid.
-What? -Yeah, go check it out.
-What? -[speaking Spanish]
No, he was there.
He was… he was… he was right here.
-I knew you was lying. -I dead-ass saw him bite him in the air.
translation.zh: ‎就知道你在撒谎 ‎我当真看到他在空中咬死人

translation.en: -You saw it too in the mirror. -Uh, I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎你也看到镜子了 ‎我不确定 我有低血糖

translation.en: Okay? I have low blood sugar.
My eyes can't be trusted.
And yo, that mirror is dirty as hell.
translation.zh: ‎顺便说一句 那面镜子脏死了

translation.en: My mirror?
-You got new mirror money? -Look…
Second of all, my father gave me that mirror when he opened back in 1978.
translation.zh:
‎其次 那面镜子
‎是我爸在1978年开店时送我的宝贝

translation.en: I'm sorry I offended your mirror.
-Listen. The vampire killed him. -[Tony] My grandfather came to--
translation.zh: ‎听我说 那个吸血鬼杀了他

translation.en: We need to tell someone.
Nobody gonna care that Slim disappeared.
translation.zh: ‎但瘦痞子失踪了根本没人会在乎

translation.en: Why? 'Cause he's a gangbanger?
No, homie. 'Cause he's from the Bronx, like us.
translation.zh:
‎不 老弟 因为他来自布朗克斯
‎跟我们一样

translation.en: Hey, let me take you home.
It's late, you're bugging,
translation.zh: ‎很晚了 你脑子不清醒了

translation.en: and your mother's gonna whoop your ass and my ass. And I'm a grown man,
translation.zh:
‎而且再不回去
‎你我都要被你妈家法伺候了 ‎我是个成年人

translation.en: and I cannot take a chancletazo to the face.
translation.zh: ‎没办法接受被拖鞋掌嘴了 好吗？

translation.en: Aight? It's embarrassing. Let's get outta here.
You think the commander is going to be pleased?
translation.zh: ‎司令知道这件事后可不会太高兴

translation.en: He's bringing bodies in here, Mr. Markus,
translation.zh: ‎他竟然带尸体回来 马库斯先生

translation.en: when he knows we need all the properties acquired without raising suspicion--
translation.zh:
‎他很清楚我们必须不引起怀疑地
‎把所有地产弄到手…

translation.en: Shut up, Frank.
Yes, sir.
Sun's coming up.
Let's get back inside.
Deal with the body, Frank.
What's poppin'? It's your girl Gloria, live,
translation.zh: ‎哟 我葛洛丽亚又来直播啦

translation.en: and I hope you got your bagels ready, 'cause I'm serving tea. Get it.
translation.zh:
‎拿出你的贝果 坐好
‎因为咱们要来聊八卦

translation.en: Becky that used to do my nails on 165, gone.
Dude that used to sell empanadas on the Concourse, gone.
translation.zh: ‎在大广场卖肉馅卷饼的家伙不见了

translation.en: I don't know what's going on, but take heed from me,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道这是怎么回事 但听我说

translation.en: sleep with one eye open, and don't get got. Get it.
translation.zh: ‎时刻保持警惕 别被盯上 懂么？

translation.en: Hey.
-What time you got in last night? -I'm thinking about nine-ish.
translation.zh: ‎你昨晚几点回来？ ‎好像是九点多

translation.en: Aw, that's funny because I was home,
translation.zh: ‎那就好笑了 因为我当时在家

translation.en: awake-ish after that, and you weren't here.
Oh. [chuckles] You were talking about last night.
I-- there was these old ladies,
these, um, blind old ladies.
Tony told me everything.
Everything, everything?
[speaking Spanish] I'm always one step ahead of you.
Look, I know how much you guys love Tony,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我知道你们很爱托尼

translation.en: but things change.
The neighborhood changes.
It's our turn.
It's just what happens.
But I'm pretty sure they're not vampires.
translation.zh: ‎但我很确定他们不是吸血鬼

translation.en: Mom! This is serious stuff.
What's serious is you cleaning this room.
translation.zh: ‎更重要的是你把房间打扫干净

translation.en: Miguel Antonio Martinez!
You said you was cleaning up these nasty-ass shorts and underwear!
translation.zh:
‎你答应要清理
‎你恶心的脏短裤和内裤的！

translation.en: -Yo, mom's a savage! -Yo, she said you got nasty underwear!
translation.zh:
‎-你妈也太无情了！
‎-她说你有脏内裤喔！

translation.en: She mad at you.
-Sup, Lil Mayor? -Sup, Lil Mayor?
translation.zh:
‎-哟 小市长
‎-哟 小市长

translation.en: I know, right? Is it a clothing store or a restaurant?
translation.zh: ‎就是啊 到底是服装店还是餐厅啊？

translation.en: Lil Mayor, I know you gonna let me spin tomorrow night, right?
translation.zh: ‎小市长 明天的DJ一职非我莫属吧？

translation.en: You know I got that… [imitates scratching record]
Listen, stop. There's a lot of things happening in this neighborhood right now.
translation.zh:
‎别闹了 听我说
‎我们街区现在不太平

translation.en: Keep your eyes open.
-All right. -That was mad vague, dog.
Yo, where's Bobby?
Don't wave at him.
-Why you messing with Henny? -Chill, man.
translation.zh:
‎-你干嘛跟亨尼混在一起?
‎-放松点

translation.en: I was protecting us.
You should be thanking me. He wanted to know where Slim is.
translation.zh:
‎你应该感谢我才对
‎他想知道瘦痞子去哪了

translation.en: He hasn't seen him since he took off after you last night.
translation.zh:
‎自从昨晚追着你跑之后
‎亨尼就再也没见过他

translation.en: Well, didn't you tell him that a flying vampire killed him?
translation.zh:
‎你没告诉他
‎他被会飞的吸血鬼杀了吗？

translation.en: Right. That whole vampire thing.
Look, don't worry.
I covered for your crazy ass.
Said you went straight to Tony's.
Bro, we good.
Come on, man.
What is this crap, yo?
Hey, you gon' pay for that?
Yo, Tony. Where's the cat?
I got a sanitation violation, bro. They took Vishu.
translation.zh: ‎我违反了卫生规定 毗湿奴被带走了

translation.en: You got a copy of Blade here?
You got $14.99?
You see what he did? He got in there. He put it in.
translation.zh: ‎看到他做什么了吗？飞天一刀斩

translation.en: I can't let you watch this. Your mother's gonna kill me.
translation.zh: ‎不能让你看下去了 你妈会宰了我

translation.en: Luis, you're the vampire expert. You need to tell us everything you know.
translation.zh: ‎路易斯 你是吸血鬼专家 ‎你得把知道的都告诉我们

translation.en: The basics.
Vampires are undead immortals that survive on the blood of the living.
translation.zh:
‎吸血鬼是拥有不死之身的活死人
‎靠吸食人血存活

translation.en: They can only go outside at night. Sunlight kills them.
translation.zh: ‎只能在夜间行动 在阳光下会自焚

translation.en: What do they do in the day?
Enclose themselves inside a protective coffin in total darkness.
translation.zh:
‎将自己关在棺材里
‎沉浸在绝对的黑暗中

translation.en: Typically, the vampires will group their coffins
translation.zh:
‎吸血鬼们通常会把棺材聚集在
‎一个秘密且安全的地方

translation.en: in a secret and secure location called a nest.
translation.zh:
‎吸血鬼们通常会把棺材聚集在
‎一个秘密且安全的地方  ‎这地方被称为巢

translation.en: A nest.
A vampire can be killed with a silver or wooden stake to the…
translation.zh:
‎（巢） ‎若想杀死吸血鬼
‎得用银桩或木桩刺穿他们的…

translation.en: -To the head. Chu-hoo. -…heart. They'll disintegrate.
translation.zh: ‎脑袋 ‎是心脏 他们会分解成灰

translation.en: You know those little round cookies that don't taste like anything they give out at church?
translation.zh:
‎你知道那个没味道的小圆饼干不？
‎去教堂时会吃的

translation.en: You mean the Eucharist?
You little heathen. If you was at church once in a while, you'd know that.
translation.zh:
‎你个异教徒
‎偶尔去一下教堂的话 你会知道的

translation.en: Put one of those Eucharists in a vampire's mouth, and he's toast.
translation.zh: ‎把圣餐放在吸血鬼嘴里 他就完蛋了

translation.en: All right.
Also garlic. What about that?
-Nah, that's not a thing. -Yes, a thing.
translation.zh:
‎-不 那是骗小孩的
‎-才不是

translation.en: Garlic is a vampire repellent.
Same with the crucifix.
Holy water is a repellent as well,
but you can also use it as a vampire detector
translation.zh: ‎而且还可以将其用作吸血鬼探测器

translation.en: because holy water boils when a vampire is close.
translation.zh:
‎因为一旦有吸血鬼在附近
‎圣水就会沸腾

translation.en: What are you guys talking about?
-Vampires. -Nothing.
Y'all really shouldn't be messing with that kinda stuff.
translation.zh: ‎你们真的不该惹上那种东西

translation.en: -[door chimes] -[Tony] Welcome to Primo Bodega. Big sexy. [speaking Spanish]
translation.zh: ‎嘿 大壮 欢迎来到邻家表哥杂货店

translation.en: That's it. It's happening right in front of us.
translation.zh: ‎一切就在我们眼皮底下上演

translation.en: A vampire can only enter your place if he's invited.
translation.zh: ‎吸血鬼只有在被邀请后才能进屋

translation.en: Tony let the vampire in last night when he said, "Welcome to Primo Bodega."
translation.zh:
‎托尼昨晚说了“欢迎来到杂货店”
‎让吸血鬼进来了

translation.en: [whispers] Right, right. Okay, okay. They can't enter bodega.
translation.zh: ‎好 知道了 他们无法进入杂货店

translation.en: -All right. -No, no.
[quietly] They need an invitation to enter,
and it's not only a bodega. It can be like a house or something.
translation.zh: ‎而且不只是杂货店 房子也一样

translation.en: A message from me. You tell him it's open season on all suckheads.
translation.zh: ‎…给他传个口信 ‎我要对吸血鬼大开杀戒

translation.en: I don't like that look. You're about to say something stupid.
translation.zh: ‎我不喜欢你这表情 你又有馊主意了

translation.en: We are not going in there.
It's daytime.
Nothing to worry about. They're all asleep, right?
translation.zh:
‎没什么好担心的
‎他们都在睡觉 对吧？

translation.en: I've gotta be out of my mind.
Come on, guys. We need proof. We got this. We're Blades.
translation.zh: ‎来嘛 我们需要证据 ‎我们行的 我们可是刀锋战士

translation.en: -Hello. -May I help you?
Yes, I'd like to talk to your manager about a sponsorship opportunity.
Seriously?
Here.
Is this your business card?
It's for charity.
Are you insane?
-We need to get out of here right now. -I'm looking for evidence.
translation.zh: ‎我们得马上离开这里 ‎我在找证据

translation.en: You know, I think you're putting way too much faith in shit that he read in a comic book.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得你过于相信
‎他在漫画书中读到的狗屁东西了

translation.en: It's a graphic novel.
[whispering] Shut up.
Come on.
He'll be with you in a moment.
He will?
The afternoon sun can be murder.
Frank Polidori. Pleasure to meet you.
translation.zh: ‎我是弗兰克波利多里 幸会

translation.en: You too.
Step into my office.
So, what can I do for you boys?
Well, we're, um…
doing this event to benefit Tony's bodega,
translation.zh: ‎要办这场活动来拯救托尼的杂货店

translation.en: and…
-We need some sponsorship-- -[Frank] I'm gonna stop you right there.
How's $2,000 sound?
-You serious? -[Frank] You know, you're right.
Let's make it three.
You know, Murnau…
is very committed to making the Bronx the best place it can be for all of us.
translation.zh:
‎非常致力于将布朗克斯打造成
‎我们所有人的理想归宿

translation.en: That's very thoughtful of you.
To put it bluntly,
this place is a forgotten area.
Every last one of you could disappear,
translation.zh: ‎就算你们所有人从地球上消失了

translation.en: and no one would even notice.
Although, I gotta say, not everyone appreciates what we're trying to do here.
translation.zh:
‎不过我得说
‎并不是所有人都感谢我们的用心

translation.en: Would you believe someone glued a flyer
translation.zh:
‎你能相信竟然有人
‎在我们在法院外的招牌上

translation.en: just like this to our sign
translation.zh:
‎你能相信竟然有人
‎在我们在法院外的招牌上 ‎贴了一模一样的传单吗？

translation.en: outside the courthouse?
You boys wouldn't know anything about that now, would you?
translation.zh: ‎但我想你们应该和这件事无关吧？

translation.en: No, no, no.
[Miguel] Luis?
-What's going on here? -[Miguel] He has low blood sugar.
-Maybe we should call his mom. -Nobody leaves this room.
translation.zh:
‎-我们该给他妈打个电话
‎-谁都不准离开这里

translation.en: But he's gonna…
-[knocking] -Hey.
What are you guys doing here?
[gasps] Oh, my gosh. Are you okay?
Well…
I'm suddenly feeling much better.
We were just talking to Mr. Polidori about sponsoring the block party, and--
translation.zh:
‎我们只是在和波利多里先生
‎聊赞助街区派对的事…

translation.en: You really should. These kids are great.
translation.zh: ‎你真的该赞助他们 这些孩子很棒

translation.en: We have an appointment. I'm sorry. My mind is…
translation.zh: ‎我们有预约吧 真抱歉 我一时忘了

translation.en: Okay, well, thank you. Nice seeing you. Nice meeting you.
translation.zh:
‎那谢谢你咯
‎很高兴见到你 很高兴认识你

translation.en: We really must be going.
Um… [chuckles] Thank you for the very generous donation.
[smacks lips] It'll really help. Oh.
-[Bobby] Go! Go! -[Miguel] Watch out!
What the hell is this?
A massive vampire nest.
Thirteen floors. Twelve coffins per floor.
translation.zh: ‎十三层楼 每层十二个棺材

translation.en: -That's 300 and-- -One hundred fifty-six vampires.
translation.zh:
‎-总共三百…
‎-一百五十六只吸血鬼

translation.en: -[Gladys] Bobby! -Close enough.
What?
Uh-uh. Don't you talk to me like that.
I ought to smack you upside the head.
And you, too.
You ain't fooling nobody.
I know what you doing.
I'mma check your cookies.
[Bobby] Where you going, Mom?
I'm going to see that man at the real estate company.
Frank Polidori.
He came by last night, wanted to know if we were selling!
translation.zh: ‎他昨晚过来了 问我们卖不卖房

translation.en: Uh, you can't talk to him.
What the hell you doing?
-Don't go there, Ma. -He's… he's a really bad man.
Of course he is. He's in real estate,
translation.zh: ‎那当然 他是搞房地产的

translation.en: but as long as his money is also real,
-I'm gon' hear him out. -Why?
Where'd you get that hat?
Bought it.
Psss. Henny better not have given that to you.
I see what he's trying to do.
Trying to pull you down the same road to hell as your daddy.
translation.zh: ‎他想让你也走上你父亲那条不归路

translation.en: This Frank Polidori, he's gon' get us out of this house,
translation.zh:
‎那个弗兰克波利多里
‎会帮我们搬出这地方

translation.en: keep you away from that life.
[Miguel] Miss Gladys, please trust us.
translation.zh: ‎格拉迪斯小姐 请相信我们

translation.en: Don't go there.
But we gon' leave this mess before you screw up.
translation.zh: ‎我们会在你搞砸之前离开这鬼地方

translation.en: Y'all can go back to your nudie search. Hmm.
-[exhales] -So, Henny gave you that hat?
So?
There are plans for dozens of buildings here.
translation.zh: ‎他们计划在这里建造数十座大楼

translation.en: I… I say we take all this to the cops.
translation.zh: ‎我说我们把这些都交给警察

translation.en: -We can't. -He's right.
-Not enough evidence. -Not what I thought you'd say.
translation.zh:
‎-这些证据不够
‎-我想说的可不是这个

translation.en: If you don't already believe in vampires, you're not gonna believe in this.
translation.zh:
‎不相信吸血鬼确实存在的人
‎是不会相信这些的

translation.en: We need something more.
We need something no one can deny.
We need to find the nest.
Also, I stole this, so we should chill with the cop talk.
translation.zh: ‎还有 这是我偷来的 所以不能找警察

translation.en: Don't touch that.
Why isn't your phone on vibrate?
Who are you?
What's poppin', y'all? This is GloTV. It looks like they got things started
translation.zh:
‎哟 欢迎收看葛妹频道 ‎看来法院的装修已经开始了
‎现场超多搬运工

translation.en: at the courthouse. They got mad movers, and it looks hella fancy in there.
translation.zh:
‎看来法院的装修已经开始了
‎现场超多搬运工 ‎里面看起来超华丽 还有水晶灯呢
‎咱们瞧瞧去

translation.en: Like, they got chandeliers. Let's check it out.
translation.zh:
‎里面看起来超华丽 还有水晶灯呢
‎咱们瞧瞧去

translation.en: Excuse me. What's in those boxes?
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 这些箱子都装着什么呀？

translation.en: [mover] Uh, Sub-Zeros.
[Gloria] They trying to tell me these big-ass boxes are Sub-Zero fridges.
translation.zh:
‎哟 他们说这些巨无霸箱子里
‎都装着高级冰箱

translation.en: Damn, these condos are gonna be nice as hell.
translation.zh: ‎靠 这些公寓肯定超棒的

translation.en: Let me guess.
They ain't refrigerators.
I think we just found the nest.
[Gloria] Yo, am I bugging, or do these boxes look like coffins?
translation.zh:
‎是我疯了
‎还是这些箱子真的像棺材？

translation.en: Come on.
Yo, it's locked.
-[whispers] Hey, check out the footprints. -[Bobby] Word, bro.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 看看这些脚印 ‎真的耶

translation.en: [Miguel] This is it. This is definitely it.
This is bad. This is definitely bad.
Can we please… can we please just go?
Can we just get our asses outta here?
Don't do it, man. Don't--
And we're prying the coffins open.
Seems unnecessary.
-Told you. -We got it. Can we just go?
translation.zh:
‎-我就说吧
‎-米格尔 知道了 走了行不？

translation.en: This is the same dude who killed Slim. I remember his stupid-ass clothes.
translation.zh:
‎就是这家伙杀死了瘦痞子
‎我记得他的傻逼衣服

translation.en: -[Luis] Go! -Oh, my God!
-Go! -[roars]
What?
Get out!
-Open the door! -[vampire growls]
[Miguel] Go!
[Luis] Go! Go!
Yo. We got 'em.
Yo, Bobby, how you not mute your phone? You almost killed us in there.
translation.zh: ‎鲍比 你干嘛没把手机调成震动？ ‎你差点害死我们

translation.en: You three are in deep shit.
Great plan, Lil Mayor. I told you cops wouldn't help for shit.
translation.zh:
‎真是妙计 小市长
‎我就跟你说警察屁用没有

translation.en: Excuse me?
Um, Sanders, it sounds like they want to go to juvie.
translation.zh: ‎桑德斯 看来他们很想进少管所啊

translation.en: We expected more from you, Lil Mayor.
translation.zh: ‎你太让我们失望了 小市长

translation.en: What are we doing here?
We need to see if Mr. Polidori's gonna press charges on you three.
translation.zh:
‎我们得看看波利多里先生
‎是否要起诉你们三个

translation.en: -Could this day get any worse? -Yes.
What is wrong with you? Huh?
What's poppin'? It's your girl Gloria. We are live and at the scene,
translation.zh:
‎哟 本小姐葛洛丽亚
‎正在事发现场为你直播

translation.en: so let me give you all the deets.
Lil Mayor and his little friends got caught up with 5-0 for trespassing.
translation.zh:
‎小市长和他的小同伴们
‎因非法侵入而被警察逮捕了

translation.en: Such fine boys, aren't they?
His mom had been on him about some dirty-ass underwear,
translation.zh: ‎他娘才刚抱怨他的内裤又脏又恶心

translation.en: and now he's in the back of a police car.
I bet this was your idea, huh?
You broke in. How could you do this? You know how hard I work?
translation.zh:
‎你怎么能非法侵入呢
‎你知道我工作多辛苦吗？

translation.en: This man got some real crazy Illuminati conspiracy theories
translation.zh:
‎这小子和他的伙伴们
‎要胡扯些疯狂的光明会阴谋论了

translation.en: to drop with him and his boys, and I'm ready for it.
translation.zh: ‎老子真期待看他出糗的样子

translation.en: Lil Mayor's about to say wild shit. Let's go see what he say.
translation.zh:
‎小市长要说些荒唐的话了
‎咱们听听去

translation.en: Okay, I know how this looks, but just trust me.
translation.zh: ‎我知道这听起来很扯 但相信我

translation.en: Everything will make sense after you see this.
translation.zh: ‎看完这个之后 你们就会明白了

translation.en: See that?
That's the vampire nest.
Inside the courthouse.
Now, brace yourselves.
This is the part when I open up the coffin.
translation.zh: ‎接下来是我撬开棺材的部分

translation.en: [Luis] Can we please… can we please just go?
-Uhh, what we supposed to be seeing? -[phone ringing on recording]
-Vampires. -[crowd] What?
-Vampires? -What?
[man] Come on.
-That's wild, bro. -Lil Mayor, what you smoking, man?
translation.zh:
‎-太扯了吧 老弟
‎-小市长 你嗑什么药了？

translation.en: -You got some more? -[crowd laughing]
I don't understand.
Vampires don't have souls.
They don't have a reflection.
You can't see them in mirrors, photos, or videos.
translation.zh:
‎在镜子、照片或视频里
‎是看不到他们的

translation.en: Know what? Forget the video. We have their plans
translation.zh:
‎别管视频了 ‎我们有他们要在这街区各个角落
‎建造吸血鬼巢的计划

translation.en: to build deadly vampire nests all over this neighborhood.
translation.zh:
‎我们有他们要在这街区各个角落
‎建造吸血鬼巢的计划

translation.en: Have a look at this.
Where'd you get this?
Okay, we may have borrowed it,
but I'd gladly give it back to Mr. Polidori if…
translation.zh:
‎不过我非常乐意
‎把它还给波利多里先生…

translation.en: and only if he comes out here
and proves he's not a vampire.
Ah, kids.
They have the most wild imaginations.
translation.zh: ‎他们就是拥有天马行空的想象力

translation.en: I caught these three trespassing at the courthouse,
translation.zh: ‎这三人非法侵入法院被我逮个正着

translation.en: and they confessed to stealing your file.
[Tony] Hey, hey, hold on a second.
I can vouch for these kids, bro. They're good kids.
translation.zh: ‎我可以向你保证 他们是好孩子

translation.en: They were just mixed up with some crazy vampire idea. That's all.
translation.zh: ‎只是被吸血鬼片洗脑了 仅此而已

translation.en: Well, the file has been returned. I suppose no harm was done.
translation.zh:
‎反正文件已经归还了
‎我想也没造成任何损失

translation.en: Right, boys?
No need to make this a legal matter.
[woman] Thank you so much.
We're so sorry.
-We don't know what got into our boys. -Boys will be boys.
translation.zh:
‎-真不知道我们孩子是怎么了
‎-没事 小孩子嘛

translation.en: What is wrong with you? Are you crazy?
I bet this was all your idea. You're gonna end up like your daddy.
translation.zh:
‎肯定都是你出的主意
‎你迟早会落得跟你爸一样的下场

translation.en: Who you looking at? Answer me!
Come on. Let's go.
[officer] Thank you.
Hey, hey, hey, Carmen. [speaking Spanish]
You let him watch Blade, didn't you?
Blade? What's that?
I am Blade! Vampires…
translation.zh: ‎我是刀锋战士 吸血鬼们…

translation.en: watch out!
He paid for it.
So that's how he's getting these crazy ideas?
translation.zh: ‎他的馊点子就是这样来的吧？

translation.en: You're not going to that bodega ever again.
translation.zh: ‎从此以后不准你再去杂货店

translation.en: What? No, no, Mom.
-Ma, Tony didn't do anything. -[speaking Spanish]
translation.zh:
‎-妈 托尼什么都没做
‎-老弟…

translation.en: Go with your mother. Listen to her. She knows best, all right?
translation.zh: ‎跟你妈回家 听她的话 她说了算

translation.en: -I know best. -Forget the vampire stuff.
Commander.
We're going to church to set you right. And clean up this room!
translation.zh: ‎我要带你去教堂好好反省一下 ‎房间给我打扫干净！

translation.en: Yo, open that gate.
[Frank] Henny, my man. Thanks for meeting me.
translation.zh: ‎亨尼 我的好家伙 谢谢你来见我

translation.en: What's this business opportunity you got for me?
translation.zh: ‎你所谓的生意机会指的是什么？

translation.en: So, my employer has become concerned that people in the neighborhood aren't responding…
translation.zh:
‎街区的人们
‎对我们的商业提议反应不够迅速

translation.en: expeditiously enough to our financial proposals.
So, I need you to make some…
let's just call it "noise" in the neighborhood.
Disturbances significant enough
to give the last holdouts the push they need to sell.
Yeah. I ain't interested in any police attention.
'Cause it would negatively impact your business. I understand that. I can dig it.
translation.zh: ‎因为那会对你的生意不利 ‎这点我当然明白

translation.en: However,
what I'm prepared to offer you tonight…
is more money for a couple of days' work than you've made in your entire life.
translation.zh:
‎能让你以几天的劳动
‎换取你一辈子都赚不到的钱

translation.en: That's right.
Additionally, there's a matter of a small piece of personal property
translation.zh: ‎还有一件事 一群街区的孩子

translation.en: that's been stolen from us by a group of neighborhood boys.
translation.zh: ‎从我们这里偷走了一件私人物品

translation.en: We'd like the stolen items returned
translation.zh: ‎我们希望你能把物品找回来

translation.en: and the perpetrators…
eliminated.
[operator] You--
Yo, why you ignoring me?
-What? I called you. -[Miguel] Luis?
Yeah. Listen. I figured it out. Dude is their familiar.
translation.zh:
‎是 听着 我搞明白了
‎那家伙是他们的亲信

translation.en: Who is their what?
Frank. The creepy real estate guy. He's the vampires' familiar.
translation.zh:
‎弗兰克 那个阴森的地产佬
‎他是吸血鬼的亲信

translation.en: -What is that? Like, a sun vampire? -[Luis] No.
translation.zh:
‎-那是啥？能见光的吸血鬼吗？
‎-不是

translation.en: A familiar is a human servant who protects his undead master during the daylight hours.
translation.zh:
‎亲信是负责在白天
‎保护其吸血鬼主人的人类仆从

translation.en: He does a vampire's bidding in exchange for eventually becoming a vampire himself.
translation.zh:
‎他替吸血鬼办事 作为交换
‎自己最终会被转化为吸血鬼

translation.en: He's making all the deals in the daytime while the vampires sleep in the nest.
translation.zh:
‎所以吸血鬼们在巢里沉睡时
‎白天里的交易全由他负责

translation.en: -Exactly. -[Carmen] Miguel!
-You going to church tonight? -[Luis] Yes.
Titi's convinced I'm possessed by el diablo.
translation.zh: ‎我阿姨坚信我被魔鬼附身了

translation.en: El diablo! That's right. That's why he's going to church tonight.
translation.zh:
‎没错 就是魔鬼
‎所以他今晚必须去教堂

translation.en: God will save him. The Lord will help him.
translation.zh: ‎上帝会拯救他 上帝会帮助他

translation.en: Told you.
See you there. I got a plan.
[Bobby] Come on, man.
Sup, little man?
Hey, look, you better go before my mom spots you.
translation.zh:
‎听我说
‎你最好在我妈发现你之前离开

translation.en: I got something. Set you and your moms up real nice.
translation.zh:
‎我有份活儿赏你
‎能让你和你妈过上好日子哦

translation.en: -Yeah, I don't know. -I'm trying to help you, bruh.
translation.zh: ‎那个 还是不要了吧 ‎我在帮你呢 老弟

translation.en: You run out the money your pops left, kicked out of school.
translation.zh:
‎你把你老爹留下的钱都花光了
‎还被退学了

translation.en: You gon' keep playing with your little friends,
translation.zh: ‎你要继续和你的小伙伴们玩耍

translation.en: or you gon' finally grow up, be the man of the house, get some respect?
translation.zh:
‎还是甘愿长大了
‎成为家里的顶梁柱 赢得点尊重？

translation.en: -What? -Meet me and Luis at church right now.
translation.zh:
‎-干嘛啦？
‎-到教堂来找我和路易斯

translation.en: -No. -I have a plan to take out these vampires.
translation.zh:
‎-不要
‎-我有个干掉吸血鬼的计划

translation.en: But we need you!
[Henny] Last chance.
I ain't asking again.
-[Miguel] Yo, is that Henny? -That your boy Miguel?
translation.zh:
‎-哟 那是亨尼吗？
‎-那是米格尔吗？

translation.en: Let me holla at him.
-I gotta go. -[Miguel] No! Bobby, don't!
translation.zh:
‎-我得挂了
‎-不 鲍比 别！

translation.en: -You know how this is gonna end with him. -[Bobby] End with him?
translation.zh:
‎-你知道跟他混是没好下场的
‎-他？

translation.en: What about with you?
In the last day, you got me into more shit than Henny ever could.
translation.zh:
‎亨尼这辈子能给我添的麻烦
‎都没有你这几天的多

translation.en: I'm done with all this. And I'm done with you!
translation.zh: ‎我受够这一切了 也受够你了！

translation.en: [Luis] Yo, Miguel.
-Bobby coming? -No.
He's with Henny.
But, uh… we can do this without him.
translation.zh: ‎不过 没有他我们也能做到的

translation.en: And what is it we're doing?
Well, well, well…
lost lambs returning to the flock.
I don't see you two at Thursday mass very often.
translation.zh: ‎你俩极少出席周四的弥撒啊

translation.en: It's tough with our responsibilities in the community and so forth and--
translation.zh:
‎基于我们在社区里背负的重大责任
‎如此等等 有点难啊

translation.en: Right, right, right. And where's the other one? Hm?
The one that likes to start melees and fraternizes with known drug dealers?
translation.zh:
‎喜欢挑事打架
‎整天跟知名毒贩混在一块的那位

translation.en: He couldn't make it.
So, can we, uh…
please go?
By all means.
I'll be watching you two.
Closely.
Miguel.
What are we doing?
Hey, how you doing? Welcome to Primo Bodega.
translation.zh: ‎你好 欢迎来到邻家表哥杂货店

translation.en: How can I help you?
Is this the famous bodega Lil Mayor's trying to save?
translation.zh:
‎这就是传说中
‎小市长想拯救的杂货店？

translation.en: Yes, it is. You know Miguel?
-Doesn't everybody? -[Tony] Yeah, it's true.
Actually, I want to help out with the block party.
translation.zh: ‎其实我想为街区派对出一份力

translation.en: I was thinking of making maple scones.
-Maple scones? -[Vivian] Yeah.
Yeah, that's a dope idea.
-[chuckles] Is it lame? -No, nah.
Maple scones are dope.
[chuckles] Is, uh… is he around?
Miguel? Nah, man, that boy is bugging.
translation.zh: ‎米格尔？不在 那孩子脑子进水了

translation.en: I taught him way better than that. I practically raised them boys, man.
translation.zh:
‎我可不是那样教他的
‎这些孩子基本上是我养大的

translation.en: -I didn't know that. -Yeah, man.
When their parents were working, they were here in the bodega, hanging out,
translation.zh:
‎他们的家长忙于工作时
‎他们就在这杂货店里呆着

translation.en: doing homework, playing video games, staying out of trouble.
translation.zh: ‎写作业 打电动 离麻烦远远的

translation.en: Are you a baseball fan?
Oh, this right here?
This is the bat that Sammy Sosa, the pride of San Pedro de Macorís,
translation.zh:
‎圣佩德罗德马科里斯的骄傲萨米索萨
‎就是用这只棒球棍

translation.en: used to hit 60 home runs in one season.
translation.zh: ‎在一个赛季中打出六十个本垒打

translation.en: -Wow. -Which had only been done four times
translation.zh: ‎这在棒球历史上只发生过四次

translation.en: in the history of baseball. You know how old baseball is?
translation.zh: ‎这在棒球历史上只发生过四次 ‎你知道棒球历史有多悠久吗？

translation.en: -It's old as shit. -[chuckles]
But that was before he started bleaching his skin, looking like Count Chocula
translation.zh:
‎但后来他把皮肤漂白了
‎看起来就像卡通版德古拉伯爵

translation.en: and one of these vampires that Miguel thinks is in the neighborhood, sucking on people's necks.
translation.zh:
‎以及那些米格尔认为
‎正在街区内到处咬人脖子的吸血鬼

translation.en: I heard about that.
[Tony] Yeah.
But, yeah. Check out the store. Peruse my wares,
translation.zh:
‎别说这个了 四处参观吧
‎看看我的商品

translation.en: you know? I got some new stuff. I got some kale.
translation.zh: ‎我有新商品上架 有羽衣甘蓝

translation.en: I got another type of kale, some flaxseeds.
translation.zh: ‎有另一种羽衣甘蓝 有亚麻籽

translation.en: You know? Some organic aloe,
translation.zh: ‎有另一种羽衣甘蓝 有亚麻籽 ‎还有有机芦荟 需要什么有什么

translation.en: whatever you need, you know?
translation.zh: ‎还有有机芦荟 需要什么有什么

translation.en: I just need this.
-That's it? Just the hummus? -Uh-hm.
Okay. Um…
You know what? On the house.
Real talk?
Yeah. You coming through with scones, I come through with hummus.
translation.zh:
‎对 你给我们弄司康
‎我请你吃鹰嘴豆泥

translation.en: Thank you.
I can see why Miguel thinks this place is so special.
translation.zh: ‎我明白米格尔为什么那么爱这地方了

translation.en: Let me get you a bag. I don't want you walking around with bare hummus.
translation.zh: ‎给你个袋子吧 ‎免得你拿着赤裸的鹰嘴豆泥四处走

translation.en: [whispers] What the…?
I'm out of bags.
I guess I'll see you at the block party.
Oh, uh…
Tell Miguel I'm looking for him.
-[door chimes] -Okay.
You've reached Lil Mayor. Leave a message.
Yo, shorty really is a vampire, dog. I looked at the thing--
translation.zh:
‎喂 辣妹真的是吸血鬼
‎我看到监控视频…

translation.en: Shit.
You'll never get them.
[Father] The body of Christ.
The body of Christ.
The body of Christ.
[whispers] I got my eye on you.
The body of Christ.
The body of Christ.
Let's all pray.
[Miguel] Hey.
This is like a top-five sin.
[Miguel] Yes! Holy water.
How do we get it out of here?
There we go.
-[upbeat music stops] -Shh. Someone's coming.
Those shits stole my Sprite.
translation.zh: ‎那两个兔崽子偷了我的雪碧

translation.en: We got the holy water, the Eucharist, and now-- Oh.
translation.zh: ‎有了圣水和圣餐 现在只差…

translation.en: Hey, hi. Hi, Rita. Hey.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 嗨 丽塔 你好啊

translation.en: I saw you two going into the sacristy.
-What were y'all doing back there? -What? No. Um…
translation.zh:
‎-你们进去干什么？
‎-什么？没有啊

translation.en: -We were busy doing… -We were trying--
-…church stuff. -Yes.
-Why are you two carrying those bottles? -This? Oh--
translation.zh:
‎-那些瓶子又是干嘛的？
‎-这个嘛…

translation.en: I have…
-low blood sugar. -Low blood sugar.
-Can I have some? -[both] No!
No, you shouldn't.
See, y'all better tell me what's really going on here
translation.zh: ‎你们最好告诉我究竟怎么回事

translation.en: before I get Father Jackson out here.
translation.zh: ‎不然我就去把杰克逊神父找来

translation.en: You're gonna think I'm crazy.
Try me.
Okay.
So…
we talked about me doing, like…
messenger-type stuff.
We did.
Then, do we really need all of this?
What'd you think this was gonna be, bruh?
You wanna be in business, be a big man and get paid,
translation.zh: ‎你想干这行 想当个男子汉 想赚钱

translation.en: this what it looks like.
Don't try telling me I'm good.
Aight, we going to every store on the block tonight.
translation.zh:
‎好 我们今晚要上门拜访
‎街区里的所有商店

translation.en: If they open, rob whoever's at the register. If they ain't,
translation.zh:
‎有开店的就抢收银台  ‎没开店的就砸店 洗劫
‎把整个地方扫射一遍

translation.en: smash the place up, loot it up, shoot it up.
translation.zh:
‎没开店的就砸店 洗劫
‎把整个地方扫射一遍

translation.en: -Frank wants 'em wrecked. -Frank?
translation.zh:
‎-弗兰克要它们面目全非
‎-弗兰克？

translation.en: We working for Frank?
-Like, the Murnau guy? -Yeah, you got a problem with that?
translation.zh:
‎-那个穆尔瑙地产的家伙？
‎-对 有意见吗？

translation.en: Nah.
Come here.
Got a special job for you.
Where Lil Mayor and that Puerto Rican kid at?
translation.zh: ‎知道小市长和波多黎各小子在哪不？

translation.en: -Why you need to know? -[Henny] Why I need to know?
translation.zh:
‎-你为啥要知道？
‎-我为啥要知道？

translation.en: This ain't a democracy, son.
I tell you what I need, and you give it to me, understand?
translation.zh: ‎我有求你就必应 听懂没？

translation.en: Yeah.
Now, find out where they at.
Strap up.
I gotta use the bathroom real quick.
[man] Boy piss his pants already?
-Vampires? Are you serious? -I know how it sounds, but--
translation.zh:
‎-吸血鬼？你有没有搞错？
‎-我知道听起来很扯 但…

translation.en: No, I'm saying, are you seriously out at night when there's vampires running around?
translation.zh:
‎不 我是说 明知道外头有吸血鬼
‎你晚上还出来？

translation.en: It's actually five vampires based on the number of coffins we saw.
translation.zh:
‎根据我们看到的棺材数量
‎其实有五只吸血鬼

translation.en: So, do you believe me?
We're Haitian, man.
My grandma's been preparing me for this my entire life.
translation.zh: ‎从小我奶奶就教我要如何对付吸血鬼

translation.en: How you think I knew why nothing was in your videos?
translation.zh: ‎所以我知道你没法拍摄到他们

translation.en: We're gonna need some garlic and some wooden stakes right the hell now.
translation.zh: ‎我们需要些蒜头和木桩 立刻马上

translation.en: Hey, what happened to Tony's?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 托尼的杂货店怎么了？

translation.en: Oh, no.
Let's pull it off.
[Bobby] Hey.
What you doing here?
Helping you. What you think?
Oh, no. I thought you was with Henny.
Turn up like your dad, shot in the streets.
translation.zh: ‎最后像你爸一样 死在大街上

translation.en: Yo! Don't talk about my pops.
While you was off playing gangsta, them vampires got Tony.
translation.zh:
‎在你忙着当小混混时
‎吸血鬼找上托尼了

translation.en: Yo! What are you two doing?
We're supposed to be best friends.
Um… are y'all done?
Because I'd like to get inside before vampires try to eat us.
translation.zh: ‎因为我想在被吸血鬼吃掉前赶紧进去

translation.en: Can y'all open the damn door?
Oh, my God.
Maybe… maybe they just took him.
Vampires don't take hostages.
This is my fault.
I mixed Tony up in this.
I brought them in here.
Don't say that.
Listen, man.
It's not your fault…
at all.
Guys.
Uh, look who just rolled up on us.
Yo, we gotta go. Henny's working for Murnau,
translation.zh:
‎我们得赶紧走
‎亨尼在替穆尔瑙地产办事

translation.en: and Frank hired him to find you.
My God, one night with you guys, and I already have vampires and thugs trying to kill me?
translation.zh:
‎天哪 我才跟你们待了一晚
‎就被吸血鬼和混混盯上了？

translation.en: Let's go.
I see you.
Holy shit.
This way.
Vivian. There's vampires out there. Come with us.
translation.zh: ‎薇薇安 外面有吸血鬼 跟我们来

translation.en: Come.
A little early for Halloween, ain't it?
translation.zh: ‎现在庆祝万圣节也太早了吧？

translation.en: What y'all supposed to be?
Why don't you four little freaks empty your pockets for us?
translation.zh:
‎把口袋里的东西都拿出来
‎你们这四个怪胎

translation.en: One…
two…
I'm talking about! We smoked them fools!
That's what's up!
[Henny] Fuck!
[Carmen] Coming!
I'm sorry. I'll put the music down.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我会把音量调低点

translation.en: Luis, Bobby…
Call your mother and your tía. They're worried sick.
translation.zh:
‎给你们妈妈和阿姨打个电话
‎她们担心死了

translation.en: Call your mom too. Okay?
[exhales] I'm so sorry for whatever they did.
translation.zh: ‎我为他们的所作所为向你道歉

translation.en: Oh, they didn't do anything wrong. I was just bringing them home.
translation.zh:
‎他们没做错什么
‎我不过是送他们回家而已

translation.en: -First time for everything. -[Vivian] Oh, I like your house.
translation.zh: ‎凡事都有第一次啊 ‎我喜欢你的房子

translation.en: [Carmen] Thank you.
[Vivian] All these colors are so cute.
[Carmen] Oh, thank you.
[Vivian] It's such a beautiful home.
[Carmen] You're too kind, Ms…
[Vivian] Oh, Vivian. Vivian. Yeah.
I'm sorry. I feel so silly just standing out here.
translation.zh: ‎我这样一直站着显得好傻哦

translation.en: Can I come in?
-No! -Luis Acosta de la Vega!
translation.zh:
‎-不行！
‎-路易斯阿科斯塔德拉维加！

translation.en: [in Spanish] Mom, don't let her in.
[in Spanish] She can't attack without an invitation.
translation.zh: ‎不被邀请 她就无法攻击我们

translation.en: Lil Mayor, why would I want to attack you?
translation.zh: ‎小市长 我为什么要攻击你呢？

translation.en: Because you're a vampire!
-Bobby! -This lady's a vampire, Ms. Martinez.
translation.zh:
‎-鲍比！
‎-这小姐是个吸血鬼 马丁内斯太太

translation.en: That's why she can't enter. She needs an invitation.
translation.zh: ‎所以才进不来 她需要你邀请她

translation.en: I need my key back, Miguel.
translation.zh: ‎我需要我的钥匙 米格尔

translation.en: Give it to me before I drain you like I did your late friend, Tony.
translation.zh:
‎把它还给我 否则你的下场
‎将会和你那被吸干的朋友托尼一样

translation.en: What are you?
I'm Vivian Tyrell,
firstborn of the Master Murnau,
commander in the vampire expedition.
Expedition? What kind of expedition?
To find my people a home.
You see, I'm just like you, Miguel.
translation.zh: ‎米格尔 其实我们没两样

translation.en: I don't want the Bronx to change.
translation.zh: ‎我也不希望布朗克斯有所改变

translation.en: [echoing] It's easier to live somewhere where no one cares when people disappear.
translation.zh:
‎这种人消失了也没人在乎的地方
‎生活起来方便多了

translation.en: I'm nothing like you!
If you give me my key back,
I promise to make your deaths quick.
Fine.
I'll give you your key.
Mommy, don't worry. We're safe as long as we stay in here.
translation.zh:
‎妈 别担心
‎只要待在屋里就不会有事

translation.en: [sighs] I'm calling the police.
You already saw with Frank. The police are on their side.
translation.zh:
‎你也看到他们护着弗兰克了
‎警察都站他们那边

translation.en: We need to stay in here until the sun comes up.
translation.zh: ‎我们得待在这里 直到天亮为止

translation.en: Call your families. We're staying here tonight.
translation.zh: ‎通知你们家人 我们今晚就待在这里

translation.en: In the morning, we're out of the Bronx.
translation.zh: ‎明天一早 我们就离开布朗克斯

translation.en: It's not worth it.
Commander.
-Is it done? -Yes, commander.
We had to go above-market, and it was an all-cash deal,
translation.zh:
‎我们得出高于市场的价格
‎而且是全现金交易

translation.en: but the building is yours.
No need for an invitation to the kid's apartment.
translation.zh: ‎不用被邀请也能踏进那小子的家门

translation.en: Commander…
I was just…
I was wondering when I'd be getting the gift.
translation.zh: ‎想知道什么时候能得到恩赐

translation.en: You know, I feel like I'm… I'm ready for it.
[Vivian] Make another mistake,
you'll never get the gift.
-[gasping] -You'll never be one of us.
translation.zh: ‎永远都别想成为我们的一员

translation.en: -So good. -Yo.
[whispers] Yo, what are you doing?
Going to the nest.
I'm gonna take out every last one of them.
We gotta defend ourselves.
We gotta show them that Tony and everyone else matters.
translation.zh:
‎我们必须让他们知道
‎托尼和这里的所有人都很重要

translation.en: If we do it together, we might have a chance.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们齐心协力
‎也许还有一线机会

translation.en: Bet.
We're going with you.
I'm done being scared.
Yo, what you doing with that stick? [speaking Spanish]
Hey, come back with that thing, man!
[Rita] Hey.
Thanks for the invite.
-We didn't know that-- -Here.
Welcome to the crew.
Thanks. Now, let's go kill some suckheads.
translation.zh: ‎谢了 走呗 杀吸血鬼去

translation.en: This way.
-This is the nest. -Yeah, I know.
That's her sarcophagus right there. If we strike her, we weaken the others.
translation.zh: ‎那就是她的石棺 ‎杀掉她就会削弱其他吸血鬼的力量

translation.en: You guys knew that, right?
No.
That's why I told y'all not to be messing with this stuff.
translation.zh: ‎所以我才说别惹上这种东西

translation.en: All right, three, two…
-[Bobby] What the hell? -They knew we were coming.
translation.zh: ‎搞什么？ ‎他们早料到我们会来

translation.en: They could be anywhere.
You gave that to Vivian.
We gotta go back and warn everybody.
-Bobby! -[Bobby] The balloons.
[Miguel] Damn.
-[Luis] What is it? -[bubbling]
[Miguel] It's bubbling.
-They must be up here. -[Rita] Miguel, it's too dangerous.
translation.zh: ‎他们肯定在楼上 ‎米格尔 太危险了 别上去

translation.en: Don't go up there.
translation.zh: ‎米格尔 太危险了 别上去

translation.en: We have 30 minutes to sundown. If we can find their hiding place,
translation.zh:
‎再过半小时就日落了
‎如果能找到他们的藏身处

translation.en: we can get a jump on them.
Well, we coming too.
Well, someone has to go warn everyone.
I'll go, and I'll get Father Jackson.
translation.zh: ‎我去吧 顺便把杰克逊神父找来

translation.en: Listen, just promise me you won't go in that room without us, okay?
translation.zh:
‎听着 答应我你们会等我们回来
‎一起进那个房间

translation.en: Okay.
Hey!
Can you tell my mom that I love her…
and that I'm sorry about, um…
uh, about my room,
about lying,
about everything?
Listen, you tell her…
when you see her.
Yo, Rita. Like, what about the rest of us?
translation.zh: ‎哟 丽塔 那我们俩呢？

translation.en: We all got messages, you know?
[smacks lips] I guess you didn't need to use them VIP passes after all, playa.
translation.zh:
‎看来你根本不需要什么贵宾通行证啊
‎情场高手

translation.en: Let's go.
This is it.
-You ready? -Yeah.
Let's go.
Where the hell are they?
Guys.
What are you doing?
We definitely dying today.
Not smart, Lil Mayor.
-What do we do now? -Um…
Open the curtains! Let the daylight in!
translation.zh: ‎拉开窗帘 让阳光照进来！

translation.en: Suck on this!
What do we have here?
How thoughtful of you.
I bought your building so I could enter and retrieve this key,
translation.zh:
‎我把你住的那栋楼买下来
‎就是为了能进去取回这把钥匙

translation.en: but you just saved me the trouble.
What is that?
This is the remains of the first vampire.
translation.zh: ‎这是世界上第一位吸血鬼的遗骸

translation.en: My maker.
The maker of all of us.
His ashes have the power to make new vampires.
translation.zh: ‎他的骨灰能够创造新的吸血鬼

translation.en: One handful of this in your mother's face,
translation.zh: ‎只要往你妈妈脸上撒一把骨灰

translation.en: a bite on her neck,
and she becomes one of us.
Body of Christ.
[Miguel] Luis! Luis! Come on. Let's go.
Yo! Did you just melt that guy's face?
translation.zh: ‎你刚刚把那家伙的脸融掉了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. It was crazy! -Go!
Go, go, go, go!
[Frank] Boys!
Whoa! Chill, man. Chill.
Bobby, Bobby, where are you going?
Listen, Frank.
They're lying to you, man.
You might be rich…
and immortal,
but you'll never be one of them.
translation.zh: ‎但你永远无法成为他们的一员

translation.en: I know that for a fact.
You'll be their kid brother, right?
That means you gonna be their bitch.
translation.zh: ‎也就是说你会是他们的走狗

translation.en: Like, for all eternity.
That's what's up?
Go.
Go!
[Miguel] Go! Go!
Useless once again.
You hungry?
Let's find those boys.
-[Bobby] Pedal faster, Miguel! -[Miguel] I'm trying!
translation.zh: ‎米格尔 骑快点啊！ ‎我在努力了！

translation.en: Vampire! Go!
-[Bobby and Miguel] Luis! -[Luis] Go!
Sneaking around where you don't belong.
Little rat.
How you like that, suckhead?
Let's cut through here and get Luis. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎穿过这里去找路易斯吧 快

translation.en: [Vivian whispering] Miguel.
Bobby, Lil Mayor, Bobby,
Miguel, Miguel, Miguel, Bobby…
Miguel…
Bobby…
Bobby! You all right? Whoa!
[Bobby] Miguel, close your eyes!
You didn't really stand a chance.
I have survived seven centuries, countless attacks.
translation.zh: ‎我活了七个世纪 经历过无数次袭击

translation.en: Miguel!
I am the most formidable creature on earth.
And you?
You're just a bunch of poor kids from this shithole you call the Bronx.
translation.zh:
‎你们只不过是
‎来自布朗克斯这个屎坑的一群穷孩子

translation.en: [man] Hey, yo!
Yo, fuck you say about the Bronx?
I know you just didn't call the Bronx a shithole!
translation.zh: ‎你竟然敢说布朗克斯是个屎坑！

translation.en: -Oh, shit. -Oh, shit.
[woman 1] Yeah, but, girl, did you see his girlfriend?
translation.zh: ‎没错 但你看到他的女朋友了吗？

translation.en: -[woman 2] Uh, she ugly, though. -Look at her.
That's her?
-Her hair's even! -Psst!
-Hell, yeah, she got a weave. -Mm-hm. She ain't fooling nobody.
-She needs to take it back. How stupid. -Psst! Psst!
-Jenny and Kendra! -[Jenny] She--
-Who this bitch? -[Kendra] I don't know, but she ugly.
translation.zh: ‎这婊子是谁？ ‎不知道 但她丑爆了

translation.en: -Gotta be going! -Aghh!
That's nasty.
Anyone move, and I'll snap his neck!
translation.zh: ‎谁敢动 我就扭断他的脖子

translation.en: It's time for some reinforcements.
And now, the finishing touch.
[Miguel] Vivian!
[Miguel] Thanks for the bat, Tony.
[man 1] Yo, you don't mess with the Bronx!
translation.zh: ‎我们布朗克斯可不是吃素的！

translation.en: [woman] You got 'em! Yeah!
Make some noise for Lil Mayor, y'all!
[man 2] We got 'em!
-You're such a good boy! -Mom!
Yo, y'all see that?
Lil Mayor and his crew did some real action-hero shit!
translation.zh:
‎小市长和他的同伴
‎简直是现实版的动作英雄！

translation.en: Hey.
Hold up. Wait. What are you doing?
-That wasn't that? -No.
Sorry. I thought…
It's all right. It's-- it's okay.
-Sorry. -Bye.
Aight, lover boy.
-Slow your roll, man. She's 16. -I don't know. I'm…
translation.zh:
‎-悠着点 她十六岁了
‎-我知道

translation.en: -Just don't forget your boys, all right? -Man, you kidding?
translation.zh: ‎可别忘了你的兄弟 知道么？ ‎开什么玩笑？我爱死你们了

translation.en: I love you guys.
[Miguel] Oh, yeah!
[woman] Oh, my God!
Oh, yeah! Let's hit it. You know what you doing?
-Hit 'em with it. -We gonna hit 'em.
-You ready? You ready? -Uh-huh. Let's go.
-You ready? They ain't ready. -Yeah.
-Yeah. I think they ready. -Ready? You ready?
-Rap. -All right.
♪ Hey, y'all, clap your hands ♪
♪ Like you don't care ♪
Let's make sure people are having a good time, but we gotta stay on the lookout.
translation.zh:
‎我们要确保大家玩得尽兴
‎但同时也要保持警惕

translation.en: Us daywalkers gotta make sure everyone's safe.
translation.zh: ‎咱们日行者得确保大家的安全

translation.en: -Daywalkers? -Yeah.
[scoffs] That's corny, yo.
Daywalker, as in Blade the Daywalker and greatest vampire hunter of all time?
translation.zh:
‎日行者 你指的是刀锋战士
‎史上最强的吸血鬼猎人？

translation.en: Of all time.
I don't know about all time, but we pretty damn good at this.
translation.zh:
‎是不是史上最强我不知道
‎但搞派对我们是挺强的

translation.en: -Hell, yeah! -Hell, yeah!
What's poppin', y'all? It's your girl Gloria with a final GloTV update.
translation.zh: ‎哟 大家好 ‎欢迎收看葛妹频道的最后一次直播

translation.en: All is well in the Bronx yet again, but we gonna keep grinding,
translation.zh:
‎布朗克斯的一切恢复正常了
‎但我们会继续奋斗

translation.en: shining, and holding each other down.
translation.zh: ‎继续闪耀 继续互相支持

translation.en: Oh, and to all future invaders,
translation.zh: ‎还有 警告所有未来的入侵者

translation.en: you don't want no smoke with the BX.
translation.zh: ‎你们可不想招惹我们布朗克斯

translation.en: Get it.
